display.description: Controls how the offer is shown to the library

internalComments.description: Comments on the offering for internal staff use

libraryComments.description: Comes from the product by default

vendorComments.description: Comments left by the vendor when adjusting prices

site.description: Vendor comments for site license pricing

pricing.description: An object with a site-license price and a map of su numbers to prices

selection.description: If product is selected, the 'users' property corresponds to the pricing object that was selected, and the date the selection was made

flagged.description: If this is persisted it means the flag was cleared manually. If the property is absent the app computes the state.

flaggedReason.description: Holds an array of reasons that the Offering was flagged

siteLicensePriceUpdated.description: Starts empty when a new cycle is created, used to track whether the vendor has updated the pricing yet

suPricesUpdated.description: Starts empty when a new cycle is created, used to track whether the vendor has updated the pricing yet

oneTimePurchaseAnnualAccessFee.description: If the product is a one-time purchase product, this is its annual access fee for the library

funding.description: If the product is funded by CARLI, contains the details of how

fundedByPercentage.description: If true, product is funded by a percentage amount, determined by 'fundedPercent'.  If false, library pays a fixed dollar amount, determined by 'fundedPrice'

fundedPercent.description: Amount of full price paid by CARLI, expressed as a percentage

fundedPrice.description: Amount of full price paid by Library, expressed in dollars
